statements: UPDATE SecurityProtocols SET stored_procedure_script = 'SELECT * FROM Users;' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE SecurityProtocols SET protocol_description = 'Updated description', protocol_name = 'New Protocol' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE blockchain_users SET username = 'john_doe', password = 'new_password123' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE security_logs SET activity = 'Login Success' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET role = 'admin' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE security_logs SET log_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, activity = 'User login' WHERE log_id = 1001;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE security_logs SET log_description = 'User login' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE blockchain_transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.00, transaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_id = 1 AND transaction_type = 'deposit'
UPDATE stored_procedures SET procedure_name='New Procedure', procedure_code='Some updated code' WHERE procedure_id=1;
UPDATE security_protocols SET protocol_description='Updated protocol description', protocol_name='Secure Protocol' WHERE protocol_id=2;
UPDATE security_protocols SET protocol_description = 'Enhanced security measures' WHERE protocol_id = 1;
UPDATE blockchain_network SET network_type = 'Permissioned' WHERE network_id = 3;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET user_name = 'Alice' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE protocol_steps SET step_description = 'Update protocol steps' WHERE protocol_id = 2 AND step_id = 3;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET public_key = 'new_public_key_value' WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE protocol_steps SET step_description = 'Updated step description' WHERE step_order = 1 AND protocol_id = 2;
